title: China may align itself with Taliban and try to exploit Afghanistan's rare earth metals, analyst warns
content:
1. China may align itself with Taliban and try to exploit Afghanistan's rare earth metals, analyst warns  CNBC
  2. Afghanistan withdrawal: China ready to capitalize as Taliban takes power amid 'US humiliation'  Fox News
  3. China says ready to deepen "friendly and cooperative" relations with the Taliban | Afghanistan News  WION
  4. Afghanistan puts China firmly on leadership hook  Reuters
  5. China: The dragon spreads its wings over Afghanistan  EURACTIV
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 中国はタリバンと手を組み、アフガニスタンのレアアースを搾取しようとするかもしれない、とアナリストは警告する。
分析师警告说，中国可能与塔利班结盟并试图开采阿富汗的稀土金属
分析師警告說，中國可能與塔利班結盟並試圖開採阿富汗的稀土金屬
